headline: How Investors May Respond To United Airlines (UAL) Record Revenue and New JetBlue Loyalty Program
summary: In the past week, United Airlines Holdings reported its third quarter 2025 results, highlighted by record revenue of US$15.23 billion and the launch of a joint loyalty program with JetBlue. The company also provided upbeat earnings guidance for the upcoming quarter and full year, signaling strong performance expectations driven by premium cabin demand and customer-focused investments. The expanded JetBlue collaboration enables United loyalty members to earn and redeem rewards across both...
